main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Pacific Grove, California, on various occasions in October 1962.
interesting points: A lighted object was observed at about 1000 ft moving at an estimated speed of 200 mph,The object was approximately 40 to 50 ft in diameter and circular in shape, emitting a bright glow,The sighting occurred under similar circumstances on at least two previous occasions,One report involved about 30 witnesses who confirmed the sighting of a glowing white disc-shaped object,The object's speed was estimated at 1200 mph, significantly surpassing that of conventional aircraft.
witness description: witnesses included a captain of firemen and civilians during different sightings
